  const lines = txt.split('
');
  const obj = {};

  lines.forEach(line => {
    let [category, tag] = line.split(':');
    if (!obj[category])obj[category] = []
    obj[category].push(e2s(category,tag));
  });

  return Object.entries(obj)

    `${rows[category]}: ${tags.join(', ')}`)
    .join('
